src/lib/components/DashApexcharts.react..description:
Wrapper for react-apexcharts library. For API and
examples see:

https://github.com/apexcharts/react-apexcharts

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

type.description: line, area, bar, pie, donut, scatter, bubble, heatmap, radialBar

width.description: Possible values for width can be 100%, 400px or 400 (by default is 100%)

height.description: Possible values for height can be 100%, 300px or 300 (by default is auto)

series.description:
The series is a set of data. To know more about the format of
the data, checkout Series docs on the website.

options.description: The configuration object, see options on API (Reference)

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
